1000.text: Training in this mode grants bonus money \nfrom achieving your horsegirl's goals.

1001.text: Fill the SHOW gauge and get extra rewards! \nThe gauge fills based on difficulty and \ngoals achieved.

1002.text: In this mode race opponents are \nslightly stronger. You will gain money \nbased on training progress.

1003.text: Fill the SHOW gauge and get extra rewards! \nThe gauge fills based on difficulty and \ntraining progress.
